data.title: Meet the model who will be walking the runway in a $2 million bra at this year's Victoria's Secret Fashion Show
data.meta_description: Lais Ribeiro has been a Victoria's Secret Angel since 2015 â€” and this year she will wear the coveted Fantasy Bra during the brand's famous runway show.
data.text:
Angel Lais Ribeiro will wear the coveted Fantasy Bra in this year's Victoria's Secret Fashion Show.

The bra costs $2 million.

The "Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra" is covered in sapphire, topaz, and gold leaf â€” and it comes with a matching belt.

Ribeiro was surprised to be selected.

Ribeiro first walked in the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in 2010 and she became an Angel in 2015.

Seven years ago, Lais Ribeiro was a shy Victoria's Secret Fashion Show rookie. This year, the model will wear the coveted, jewel-encrusted Fantasy Bra during the runway show, which will be held in Shanghai, China, on November 20.

Introducing the $2 million Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra, worn by @laisribeiro & designed by @mouawadjewelry. Go behind the bling & discover the Dream Angels bra inspired by the fantasy (link in bio). ðŸ¥‚#VSFantasyBra #VSFashionShow

A post shared by Victoria's Secret (@victoriassecret) on Nov 1, 2017 at 6:11am PDTNov 1, 2017 at 6:11am PDT

The "Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra" costs $2 million and is covered in sapphire, topaz, and 18-karat gold leaf, according to People. It also comes with a matching belt, although it's unclear if that accessory is factored into the price tag.

This will be her first time wearing the Fantasy Bra.

"I am very happy and thankful for my Victoria's Secret family for trusting me and all the support from my on family, friends, and fans!" she wrote in an Instagram post announcing the news.

I've been holding this secret for too long and I am beyond honored to announce that I will be wearing the Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra this year! I am very happy and thankful for my Victoria's Secret family for trusting me and all the support from my on family, friends and fans! THANK YOU SO MUCH!!! ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ its official!! ðŸ’ŽðŸ˜­

A post shared by Lais Ribeiro (@laisribeiro) on Nov 1, 2017 at 6:19am PDTNov 1, 2017 at 6:19am PDT

Ribeiro didn't know that she was in the running to wear the Fantasy Bra and was moved to tears when she found out she was chosen. "I never cried so much in my entire life â€” and I have a baby," she told People.

You can watch her reaction in this video, which is from People.

"Who doesn't dream about wearing the Fantasy Bra â€” I mean it's an honor to be among Gisele [BÃ¼ndchen], Candice [Swanepoel], Adriana [Lima], and all the big top models who have worn it in the past," Ribeiro said. "I get too emotional talking about this. I have to work on that."
